edu.stanford.cs.pptx.karel

Class PPKarel

  • Object
    • edu.stanford.cs.pptx.karel.PPKarel

  • public class PPKarel
extends Object
    This program creates a slideshow version of a Karel program.

      • PPKarel

    • Method Detail

      • run

        public void run()
        Runs the Karel program. Subclasses override this method with code to accomplish a specific task.

      • move

        public void move()
        Moves Karel forward one square. If Karel is blocked by a wall, executing this method throws a runtime exception.

      • turnLeft

        public void turnLeft()
        Turns Karel left 90 degrees.

      • turnRight

        public void turnRight()
        Turns Karel right 90 degrees.

      • turnAround

        public void turnAround()
        Turns Karel around 180 degrees.

      • pickBeeper

        public void pickBeeper()
        Picks up a beeper from the current square and places it in Karel's beeper bag. If there are no beepers on the current square, this method throws a runtime exception.

      • putBeeper

        public void putBeeper()
        Takes a beeper from Karel's beeper bag and puts it on the current square. If there are no beepers in the beeper bag, this method throws a runtime exception.

      • frontIsClear

        public boolean frontIsClear()
        Returns true if Karel is not facing a wall and could therefore move forward.
        Returns:
        The value true if Karel is not facing a wall.

      • frontIsBlocked

        public boolean frontIsBlocked()
        Returns true if Karel is facing a wall.
        Returns:
        The value true if Karel is facing a wall

      • paintCorner

        public void paintCorner(Color color)
        Paints the current corner using the specified color.
        Parameters:
        color - The new color of the corner

      • paintCorner

        public void paintCorner(int rgb)
        Paints the current corner using a six-digit hexadecimal integer. The rgb parameter is in the form 0xRRGGBB, where RR is the red intensity, GG is the green intensity, and BB is the blue intensity.
        Parameters:
        rgb - A six-digit hexadecimal integer representing the new color

      • paintCorner

        public void paintCorner(double red,
                        double blue,
                        double green)
        Paints the current corner using independent values for the red, green, and blue intensities. Each value is a number in the range 0 to 1.
        Parameters:
        red - The red intensity
        green - The green intensity
        blue - The blue intensity

      • newColor

        public Color newColor(int rgb)
        Returns a Java color composed from a six-digit hexadecimal integer. The rgb parameter is in the form 0xRRGGBB, where RR is the red intensity, GG is the green intensity, and BB is the blue intensity.
        Parameters:
        rgb - A six-digit hexadecimal integer representing the new color
        Returns:
        The corresponding Java color

      • random

        public boolean random()
        Returns the value true 50% of the time.
        Returns:
        The value true 50% of the time

      • random

        public boolean random(double p)
        Returns the value true with probability p.
        Parameters:
        p - The probability of success as a number between 0 and 1
        Returns:
        The value true with probability p

      • cornerColorIs

        public boolean cornerColorIs(Color color)
        Returns true if the current corner has the specified color.
        Parameters:
        color - The color you're checking for
        Returns:
        The value true if the current corner has that color

      • cornerColorIs

        public boolean cornerColorIs(int rgb)
        Returns true if the current corner has the specified color. The rgb parameter is in the form 0xRRGGBB, where RR is the red intensity, GG is the green intensity, and BB is the blue intensity.
        Parameters:
        rgb - A six-digit hexadecimal integer representing the new color
        Returns:
        The value true if the current corner has that color

      • cornerColorIs

        public boolean cornerColorIs(double red,
                             double blue,
                             double green)
        Returns true if the current corner has the specified color.
        Parameters:
        red - The red intensity
        green - The green intensity
        blue - The blue intensity
        Returns:
        The value true if the current corner has that color

      • pause

        public void pause(double milliseconds)
        Pauses the display for the specified number of milliseconds to support Karel animation.
        Parameters:
        milliseconds - The delay time

      • getLocation

        public Point getLocation()
        Returns the current Karel location.
        Returns:
        A point indicating the current location of Karel

      • setLocation

        public void setLocation(Point pt)

                        int y)

      • getDirection

        public int getDirection()
        Return the direction in which Karel is facing. The result is one of the constants NORTH, EAST, SOUTH, or WEST.
        Returns:
        the direction in which Karel is facing

      • setDirection

        public void setDirection(int dir)
        Sets the direction in which Karel is facing. The parameter is one of the constants NORTH, EAST, SOUTH, or WEST.
        Parameters:
        dir - The direction in which Karel should be facing
